Package org.apache.tiles.request.freemarker.servlet

Servlets for easy addition of shared variables.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    SharedVariableFactory
    It is an object that can create a shared variable, as a template model.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    WebappClassTemplateLoader
    Delegates loading templates using a WebappTemplateLoader and, if not found, a ClassTemplateLoader.

Package org.apache.tiles.request.freemarker.servlet Description

Servlets for easy addition of shared variables.
